## FieldVariable.configure\_() method

Configure the field based on the given map of options.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected configure_(config: AnyDuringMigration): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | AnyDuringMigration | A map of options to configure the field based on. |
